Basic Archery (Inferior).description: Unlocks basic proficiency with bows, crossbows, and adds a minuscule bonus to the effect of agility and strength when using a ranged weapon.
Basic Archery (Inferior).flavor: An Archer's best friend is the bow in his hand, and the arrow in his foe's heart.

Basic One-Handed Weapon (Inferior).description: Unlocks basic proficiency with most one-handed weapons and adds a minuscule bonus to the effect of agility and strength when using a fitting melee weapon.
Basic One-Handed Weapon (Inferior).flavor: The Archer may not be a master in the arts of close combat but is far from helpless.
